    Methods in CharacterSystems that return Mech
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Mech
    EntityComponentGenerator.iNeedAMech()
    iNeedAMech generates a Mech object and populates the mechName and mechColor field based on a random seed 0-9 by calling Random().
